name: places/ChIJ9Uy8hp72wokRQ29gryo3UWY
adrFormatAddress: 4047 Broadway, New York, NY 10032-1516, USA

originalText.text:
You will pay a lot. But the service was top rate. I got my vision checked and my first pair of glasses from Dr Gold many years ago and still use them, they look great.

He takes time and focuses on the patient in front of him, it does not feel at all rushed. God bless him and the workers of the practice

text.text:
You will pay a lot. But the service was top rate. I got my vision checked and my first pair of glasses from Dr Gold many years ago and still use them, they look great.

He takes time and focuses on the patient in front of him, it does not feel at all rushed. God bless him and the workers of the practice

originalText.text:
I purchase my contacts online through websites like Contactsdirect or 1800contacts because it works for my budget and is half the price as compared to Broadway Vision. I paid $120 for a contact exam to get my prescription so I can purchase contacts online. After wanting to change brands I went in office to have it updated to a different brand, but I was told that this change could not be made as there was a change in management. My contact exam was within the one year time frame. I was told that my exam was no longer valid as management recognizes contact lens exams up to 6 months - as stated by Dr. Gold.

Of note, they were willing to sell me the brand that I wanted even though the prescription was not updated.

I will no longer go here and would not recommend anyone to go here. I would recommend going to larger chain eyeglass stores such as Cohen's Fashion Optical, Warby Parker, or LensCrafters. I have never had an issue with requesting a change to my prescription in the past with these providers.

In 2003, Congress passed a law called The Fairness to Contact Lens Consumers Act. This law set forth the requirements for the expiration of contact lens prescriptions. A contact lens prescription "Shall not expire less than one year from the date you were given a copy of your prescription, following the completion of your contact lens exam and fitting, unless you have a specific medical reason that would warrant you seeing the doctor for an updated exam in less than one year."

originalText.text: Dr Gold is phenomenal. He takes his time in explaining everything. Extremely honest and helpful. His staff are very courteous and answered all my concerns. If I can give more stars I would’ve. The best in upper Manhattan.

text.text: Dr Gold is phenomenal. He takes his time in explaining everything. Extremely honest and helpful. His staff are very courteous and answered all my concerns. If I can give more stars I would’ve. The best in upper Manhattan.

originalText.text: Dr. Gold is always a pleasure. He is caring, informative, and thorough. My mother and my daughter are also patients and they are very comfortable with him. The staff is courteous and professional. I have been a patient for many years and although he is four hours away from where I live, I don't want to change doctors. These days is difficult to find a good doctor, but Dr. Gold is a 10+!

text.text: Dr. Gold is always a pleasure. He is caring, informative, and thorough. My mother and my daughter are also patients and they are very comfortable with him. The staff is courteous and professional. I have been a patient for many years and although he is four hours away from where I live, I don't want to change doctors. These days is difficult to find a good doctor, but Dr. Gold is a 10+!

originalText.text: Dr. Gold and his staff at Broadway Vision deserve the high praise reflected in these reviews! I've been going there for at least five years now, and I always enjoy my experience. They're a busy place, but you don't wait a long time, the staff are welcoming and diligent, and Dr. Gold is efficient, smart, and gives good advice. He's also fun to talk with! Don't hesitate, go here.
